data.text: @hacepeda @0ilHand @elerianm Globalisation is going to change v.rapidly to regionalisation, it's starting now!
@elerianm The market is betting that the war in Ukraine will moderate the fed's decision about rate hikes. That's cheap psychology ... And the fed is probably tired to be the market's bitch.
@elerianm Maybe put your charts away for a moment
@Tibet59019901 @0ilHand @elerianm Back when the world was not as interconnected as it is right nowâ€¦ globalization!
@elerianm So are you predicting a second bottom like you did in 2020?
@0ilHand @elerianm Absolutely. That has been the case throughout history and it will remain.

@elerianm Please do your homework and study how the markets function during wars. Just stop twitting the bleeding obvious, it reflects the fact that u know nothing! We don't have time for your rubbish.
@elerianm Ukraine is a mere pawn in a larger game and a country of no importance to anyone except a few countries in Europe.
